short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your browsing effortlessly by activating extensions only when needed, enhancing convenience and security.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Manager streamlines the management of your search extensions.

With Search Manager, you can easily enable or disable extensions.

Learn more:  https://kidsmode.me/
